footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Synergy: Sigewinne | Update Date: 07/01/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Furina is by far Sigewinne's best teammate. Most of the time, another Hydro character alongside Sigewinne is recommended for most teams.

Offensive teammates who can do off-field skill damage are buffed by Sigewinne, giving a reason to run her for these teams.
